Package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IABUniversalAdId
    An abstraction of the IAB definition of Universal Ad ID.
    IAdContext
    IAdContext is the main facade for ad requesting, should be created in each Activity that wants to display Ads.
    IAdInstance
    Internal context of an ad instance.
    IAdManager
    IAdManager is the IAdContext creator.
    IConstants
    The IConstants interface contains all the constants for ad serving and rendering
    ICreativeRendition
    Interface for creative rendition, only for renderer use by now.
    ICreativeRenditionAsset
    Interface for creative rendition asset, only for renderer use by now.
    ICTSAdContext
    ICTSAdContext instances are used as ad contexts for CTS SSAI integration.
    ICTSDelegate
    ICTSDelegate is an interface that should be implemented by the app in CTS SSAI integration.
    IEvent
    IEvent is the value object for carrying out event info:
    IEventListener
    IEventListener is common interface for event listeners.
    IParameterHolder
    IParameterHolder is an interface to be implemented by all the parameter holders
    IRendererController
    IRendererController is the common interface for controlling ad renderers.
    ISlot
    ISlot is the base Ad placement unit, which is used to play the ads.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IConstants.ActivityState
    Enumeration of activity states
    IConstants.CapabilityStatus
    Capability Status.
    IConstants.CTSUrlEncryptionType
    Encryption type used for URL.
    IConstants.IdType  
    IConstants.ModuleType
    Enumeration of module types
    IConstants.ParameterLevel  
    IConstants.RequestMode
    Enumeration of Request Modes
    IConstants.SlotInitialAdOption
    Enumeration of non-temporal slot ad initial options
    IConstants.SlotType
    Enumeration of slot types
    IConstants.TimePositionClass
    Enumeration of slot time position classes
    IConstants.UserAction
    Enumeration of user actions
    IConstants.VideoAssetAutoPlayType
    Enumeration of Video Asset Auto Play types
    IConstants.VideoAssetDurationType
    Enumeration of Video Asset Duration types
    IConstants.VideoState
    Enumeration of current video asset's playback states
